### Requirements

If you have made **any** visual changes to the GUI. Make sure you have:

- [ ] Tested on iOS device
- [ ] Tested on Android device
- [ ] Tested on small-screen device (iPod Touch)
- [ ] Tested on large-screen device (tablet)
